import dask.dataframe as dd
import numpy

numpy.random.seed(2021)


file1 = dd.read_csv("../input/tps21/0.part",
                        dtype={'loss': float,'id':int})
file2 = dd.read_csv("../input/tps21/submission_weighted_ensemble_22.csv",
                        dtype={'loss': float,'id':int})
file3 = dd.read_csv("../input/tps21/submission_weighted_ensemble_24.csv",
                        dtype={'loss': float,'id':int})
file4 = dd.read_csv("../input/tps21/submission.csv",
                        dtype={'loss': float,'id':int})

file1.loss = file3.loss.apply(lambda x: x + numpy.random.normal(0.015, 0.0019))

file1.to_csv('dspyt_com.csv',index=False)
